FIX-TEST-BOOTSTRAP.title: Fix Test Mocks and Agent Attributes
FIX-TEST-BOOTSTRAP.instruction:
Fix Category A, B, and D failues (mocking, DTOs, and missing attributes). 1. Update tests to provide missing config_manager to Bank. 2. Ensure MockAgents have _econ_state. 3. Update DTO initializations (e.g., FirmStateDTO). 4. Add 'gender' attribute to Household class in core_agents.py.

FIX-SYSTEM-LOGIC.title: Fix Core Economic Logic Bugs
FIX-SYSTEM-LOGIC.instruction:
Fix Category C and E logic failures. 1. Investigate and fix total_consumption aggregation in indicator_pipeline. 2. Ensure government.tax_agency.collect_tax is called correctly. 3. Resolve the TypeError in test_depression_scenario_triggers by fixing data flow between components.

FIX-LEAK-ACCOUNTING.title: Resolve 8000 Monetary Leak
FIX-LEAK-ACCOUNTING.instruction:
Resolve the consistent 8000 unit money leak. 1. Update scripts/trace_leak.py to account for government spending (e.g., infrastructure) in 'authorized_delta'. 2. Verify if the leak persists; if so, investigate untracked money creation in settlement or government modules.
